00091 
00092     // FIXME AC  Non funziona con gli array di lunghezza 0 (size=0)
00093     // vedi anche readArrayOfBytes
00094     // FIXME AC  Usare le funzioni in geometry/utils.h per parsare bene "inf" e "nan"
00095     template<typename T>
00096     void readArray(T** a, size_t *n)  throw (ReadingException)
00097     {
00098         size_t sz = atoi(getAttributeValue("size").c_str());
00099         xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00100         if (sz == 0) throwIt("No 'size' attribute in array element");
00101         *a = new T[sz];
00102         const char* xs = (const char*) xmlTextReaderConstValue(reader);
00103         stringstream ss(string((xs ? xs : "")));
00104         for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
00105             bool b = (ss >> (*a)[i]);
00106             if (!b) throwIt(string() + "I expected more array values (string was: '" + ss.str() + "')");
00107         }
00108         *n = sz;
00109     }
00110     void readArrayOfBytes(uint8_t** a, size_t *n)  throw (ReadingException);
00111 
00112     void throwIt(cstr error) throw (ReadingException);
00113 };
